title: Allow changing the deployment domain name again

requirements.text: Enable changing/setting the app’s deployment domain name again, and validate the domain against the platform rules (5–50 characters; only letters, numbers, and hyphens). If the provided domain is invalid, show a clear English validation error indicating the rule that was violated.

quotes: can i change the domain name again

acceptanceCriteria: There is a supported way to set/update the deployment domain name for this app again (not a one-time-only setting).
Any attempted domain value that contains disallowed characters (anything other than letters, numbers, hyphens) is rejected with an English validation message.
Any attempted domain value shorter than 5 characters or longer than 50 characters is rejected with an English validation message.
A valid domain value (5–50 chars, letters/numbers/hyphens only) is accepted and used for the deployment domain without breaking the existing app behavior.

constraints: Do not change any existing Valentine’s Day page functionality (Yes/No interactions, overlay, parallax hearts, etc.) as part of this request.
Domain names must be 5–50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Adding new Valentine’s Day features, animations, or UI content unrelated to domain configuration.
Backend feature development (the backend currently has no app logic and does not need to change for domain naming unless strictly required by the platform).
